summary: Local coach based on last 7 days. Latest pH=6.718, TDS=1605.6 ppm, Temp=18.25 °C.

insights.recommendation: Calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01 buffers; adjust with pH up/down to 6.6–7.2.
If high: partial water change or dilute; if low: remineralize / add nutrients.
Keep ~22–28 °C for tilapia; use heater/chiller or shading as needed.
